content: ribbon 1 yard/meter of ¼ inch 0 6 cm ribbon gauge adult version baby version 23 5 sts x 20 row = 4 inches 10 cm in single_crochet 37 sts x 32 row = 4 inches 10 cm in single_crochet blo blo pattern notes the top is worked in two separate pieces the front panels are worked directly onto the front opening and sewn to it at their bottom for the body all stitches are worked through the back loop only blo for the front panels neckline and armhole edgings all stitches are worked through both loops on decrease row instructions may tell you to single_crochet across to last st in that case you leave that last stitch unworked and turn this pattern is written according to us crochet terminology for uk/ nz /aus equivalents see table below us uk nz aus single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet dtr half_double_crochet half_double_crochet fsc fdc contact juliavaconsin@gmail com © 2010 julia vaconsin 3 shell pattern instructions back begin armhole shaping chain 78 82 86 90 row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each chain across turn - 77 81 85 89 sts row 2-5 chain 1 working in blo throughout body of pattern single_crochet across turn sizes s m only row 6 chain 1 single_crochet 2 in first st single_crochet across turn - 78 82 sts row 7 chain 1 single_crochet across turn size s only row 8 chain 1 single_crochet 2 in first st single_crochet across turn 79 sts row 9 chain 4 counts as first treble here and throughout skip first st treble_crochet 16 double_crochet 17 half_double_crochet 17 single_crochet to end turn row 10 chain 1 single_crochet 2 in first st single_crochet across turn 80 sts row 11 chain 1 single_crochet across to last 2 sts single_crochet 2 in each of last 2 sts turn 82 sts contact juliavaconsin@gmail com © 2010 julia vaconsin 4 row 12 chain 1 single_crochet 2 in each of first 2 sts single_crochet across turn 84 sts row 13 chain 1 single_crochet across to last 2 sts single_crochet 2 in each of last 2 sts turn 86 sts size m only row 8 chain 1 single_crochet across turn row 9 chain 1 single_crochet across to last st single_crochet 2 in last st turn 83 sts row 10 chain 1 single_crochet across turn row 11 chain 4 counts as first treble here and throughout skip first st treble_crochet 17 double_crochet 18 half_double_crochet 18 single_crochet to last st single_crochet 2 in last st turn 84 sts row 12 chain 1 single_crochet 2 in first st single_crochet across turn 85 sts row 13 chain 1 single_crochet across to last st single_crochet 2 in last st turn 86 sts row 14 chain 1 single_crochet 2 in each of first 2 sts single_crochet across turn 88 sts row 15 chain 1 single_crochet across to last 2 sts single_crochet 2 in each of last 2 sts turn 90 sts sizes l xl only row 6 chain 1 single_crochet across
